videos.headline: BYU's Wilson throws a strike to Collie for 26-yard TD
videos.description: BYU strikes first vs. Western Michigan as Zach Wilson throws a dart to Dylan Collie for a 26-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Broncos' Bogan escapes for 33-yard TD
videos.description: Jamauri Bogan escapes from BYU defenders for a 33-yard  Western Michigan touchdown.

videos.headline: BYU's Wilson connects with Collie for 8-yard TD
videos.description: Zach Wilson completes his 11th straight pass as he threads the needle to Dylan Collie for an 8-yard BYU touchdown.

videos.headline: BYU's Burt bursts for 37-yard TD
videos.description: Riley Burt dashes up the middle for a 37-yard BYU touchdown.

videos.headline: BYU's Hifo snags one-handed catch for 70-yard TD
videos.description: Zach Wilson continues his stellar play as he completes his 14th straight pass to Aleva Hifo for a 70-yard BYU touchdown.

videos.headline: Wilson completes his 18th straight pass for 5-yard TD
videos.description: Zach Wilson eludes Western Michigan defenders and finds Dax Milne for a 5-yard BYU touchdown.
